title: Interview With Abderrahim Foqaraa of Al Jazeera Arabic (US Department of State)
text: ( Source : US Department of State ) QUESTION: Mr. Secretary , thank you for doing this, first of all. SECRETARY KERRY: Thank you . QUESTION: Let me start you off with a very broad question on Syria : How important is Syria to U.S. interests in
